original_text: Then after that the Levites can go in to work in the Tent of Meeting. But you must make them clean and you must bring them to me as a special gift.
korean_text: 네가 그들을 정결하게 하여 요제로 드린 후에 그들이 회막에 들어가서 봉사할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Then after that the Levites can go in
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 레위인들은 들어갈 수 있고

sentences.original_text: to work in the Tent of Meeting
But you must make them clean
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 그들을 정결하게 해야 하고

sentences.original_text: and you must bring them to me
